dialogue.speaker: Lady Evelyn Windsor
dialogue.text: Welcome, Captain Jameson, to the Windsor Estate. I've been expecting you.

dialogue.speaker: Captain Jameson
dialogue.text: Lady Evelyn, it's a pleasure to make your acquaintance. Your estate is as beautiful as I've heard.

dialogue.speaker: Lady Evelyn Windsor
dialogue.text: Thank you, Captain. Please, come in and let's speak of the reason for your visit. I believe it concerns the mysterious letter you received?
